sect1.title: Organization
sect1.para: The documentation is divided up into three parts. The first part is a basic tutorial on Gnumeric. The second part is an advanced tutorial on the data analysis tools and plugins Gnumeric offers. The third part is a reference to the program, listing in detail all the options and features, and a reference to the functions Gnumeric provides.
